messages.msgSnippet: I currently teach it so I learn a lot that way. I also studied with a few master herbalists, for the past five or so years.   I studied what college had about
messages.messageBody:
I currently teach it so I learn a lot that way. I also studied with a few
master herbalists, for the past five or so years. I studied what college
had about the subject, horticulture, botany, forestry, psychology...
What I do can be more easily explained at http://www.demetria.com
----- Original Message -----
From: "Nanci and Thomas Kuykendall" <tn-k4of5@...>
To: <unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 20, 2000 4:55 PM
Subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] INtroduction


>
>
> >I am an herbalist and i own my own company. i am starting my MA in
holisitic health in the spring
>
> Hello and welcome! I am interested in the Herbalism you mentioned. Would
you share more about what you do and how you learned?
>
> Nanci K.

messages.subject: INtroduction
messages.msgSnippet: Hi My name is demetria. I have wanted to unschool for as long as I can remember hearing about it, I lived a time in a commune. I have two boys Jacob almost
messages.messageBody:
Hi
My name is demetria. I have wanted to unschool for as long as I can remember
hearing about it, I lived a time in a commune.
I have two boys Jacob almost four and Taro almost 2
We are already having a blast.
I am an herbalist and i own my own company. i am starting my MA in holisitic
health in the spring. We are all vegetarian contemplating the vegan step,
wouldn't be much of a leap at this point. We live in Vermont and I am
starting a cooperative program with friends for unschoolers. we have 6
children so far who we will all get together with. Anyway...
demetria
http://www.demetria.com
